languages.text: "Ублюдок, завидев меня, попытался бежать. Его сослуживцы замешкались и не освободили мне дорогу — не было времени выяснять, находятся они в сговоре с преступником или поддались панике, пришлось задействовать Глейто в целях подавления".

traits.locale_text: "Ублюдок, завидев меня, попытался бежать. Его сослуживцы замешкались и не освободили мне дорогу — не было времени выяснять, находятся они в сговоре с преступником или поддались панике, пришлось задействовать Глейто в целях подавления".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."
languages.original_text: "Ублюдок, завидев меня, попытался бежать. Его сослуживцы замешкались и не освободили мне дорогу — не было времени выяснять, находятся они в сговоре с преступником или поддались панике, пришлось задействовать Глейто в целях подавления".

"The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."

languages.text: 「あのクズは私の姿を見るなり逃げ出そうとしました。仲間のクルーたちは戸惑って道を空けませんでした。犯人をかくまっていたのか、それともただパニックに陥っていただけなのかを見極める時間はありませんでした。ですから鎮圧するためにグライトを使うしかなかったのです」
languages.original_text: "The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."

traits.locale_text: 「あのクズは私の姿を見るなり逃げ出そうとしました。仲間のクルーたちは戸惑って道を空けませんでした。犯人をかくまっていたのか、それともただパニックに陥っていただけなのかを見極める時間はありませんでした。ですから鎮圧するためにグライトを使うしかなかったのです」

languages.text: "O adi herif beni görür görmez kaçmaya kalkıştı. Yancılığını yapan tayfalar da tereddüt edip peşinden gitmeme engel oldu. Suçluya mı yardım ediyolardı yoksa sadece paniklemişler miydi öğrenecek vaktim yoktu, ben de onları bastırmak için Glaito'yu kullanmak zorunda kaldım."
languages.original_text: "The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."

traits.locale_text: "O adi herif beni görür görmez kaçmaya kalkıştı. Kendisinin yancı mürettebat üyeleri de tereddüt ettiler ve bana yol açmadılar. Suçluya mı yardım ediyolardı yoksa sadece paniklemişler miydi öğrenecek vaktim yoktu, ben de durumu bastırmak için Glaito'yu kullanmak zorunda kaldım."

languages.text: «El malnacido intentó huir nada más verme. Los otros tripulantes dudaron y no me abrieron paso. No había tiempo para descubrir si estaban ayudando al criminal o era solo pánico, así que usé a Glaito para contenerlos».
languages.original_text: "The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."

traits.locale_text: «El malnacido intentó huir nada más verme. Los otros tripulantes dudaron y no me abrieron paso. No había tiempo para descubrir si estaban ayudando al criminal o era solo pánico, así que usé a Glaito para contenerlos».

languages.text: “那个混蛋一看到我便转头就跑，他的几个同伴犹豫了一下，没有给我让路。我没时间弄清楚他们是在有意包庇罪犯，还是只是被吓慌了神，因此我不得不让格雷托进行镇压。”
languages.original_text: "The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."

traits.locale_text: “那个混蛋一看到我便转头就跑，他的几个同伴犹豫了一下，没有给我让路。我没时间弄清楚他们是在有意包庇罪犯，还是只是被吓慌了神，因此我不得不让格雷托进行镇压。”

languages.text: « Ce scélérat a tenté de fuir en m'apercevant. Ses camarades ont hésité et ne se sont pas ôtés de mon chemin. Je n'avais pas le temps de vérifier s'ils tentaient de protéger le coupable ou s'ils étaient simplement en proie à la panique, j'ai donc ordonné à Glaito d'appliquer des mesures de suppression. »
languages.original_text: "The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."

traits.locale_text: « Ce scélérat a tenté de fuir en m'apercevant. Ses camarades ont hésité et ne se sont pas ôtés de mon chemin. Je n'avais pas le temps de vérifier s'ils tentaient de protéger le coupable ou s'ils étaient simplement en proie à la panique, j'ai donc ordonné à Glaito d'appliquer des mesures de suppression. »

languages.text: "Der Bastard wollte fliehen, als er mich sah. Seine Kollegen haben gezögert und mich nicht durchgelassen ... ich hatte nicht die Zeit, herauszufinden, ob sie dem Missetäter helfen wollten oder einfach nur in Panik waren ... also musste ich sie mit Glaito in Schach halten."
languages.original_text: "The bastard tried to run when he saw me. His fellow crew members hesitated and didn't make way for me — there was no time to find out if they were abetting the perpetrator or just panicking, so I had to use Glaito for suppression purposes."

traits.locale_text: "Der Bastard wollte fliehen, als er mich sah. Seine Kollegen haben gezögert und mich nicht durchgelassen ... ich hatte nicht die Zeit, herauszufinden, ob sie dem Missetäter helfen wollten oder einfach nur in Panik waren ... also musste ich sie mit Glaito in Schach halten."
